headline: How The Narrative Surrounding Halliburton (HAL) Is Shifting After Q3 And Power Growth Hopes
summary: Halliburton’s updated narrative now reflects a modestly higher modelled fair value, moving from US$30.38 to US$31.72, built on slightly higher expected revenue growth of 1.70% and a small reduction in the discount rate to 7.56%. This tweak captures how recent Street research is balancing solid Q3 execution and potential new power related opportunities against ongoing questions about U.S. land headwinds and the recent rally in oil and gas names. As you read on, you will see how these shifting...

headline: Trump pushes for $100 billion in oil investments in Venezuela while Exxon and others say it’s currently ‘uninvestable’ without major reforms
summary: Oil giants tell Trump they need stability and considerable legal and political reforms before investing big in Venezuela.
